ORIGO.IC.summary: Origo hf. provides IT services and solutions in Iceland and Sweden. It provides Aurora Cloud, an enterprise class solution; Cloud Compliance and Quality, a cloud-based quality management solution; Caren, a cloud-based car rental system; and healthcare software solution. It also offers cloud and SAP based payroll and human resource management systems. In addition, the company provides applications development, systems integration, facilities management, project and portfolio management, business process consultancy, consulting, and managed services, as well as develops Websites and Web applications for the travel, and film and broadcast industry. It focuses on the healthcare, financial services, logistics, and aviation industries, as well as the government sector.
